about_the_game: DOSBox Pure was developed by Psyraven in 2020, tailored specifically for RetroArch/Libretro, and features advanced options such as save states, an on-screen keyboard, customizable controller configurations, and rewinding. It is designed with simplicity and user-friendliness in mind.

It is designed with simplicity and user-friendliness in mind.
